name: js-notes
description: The following commands should work after running node index.js ``` curl -s -XGET http://localhost:3000/notes | jq [] ``` ``` curl -s -XPOST -H 'content-type: application/json' http://localhost:3000/notes -d '{"title":"Groceries list", "content": "Tomatoes, yoghurt, honey, milk"}' | jq
